mapper.select: select * from jianpan order by price
select * from jianpan where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by price
select * from jianpan where price <=49 order by price
select * from jianpan where price >=50 and price <=99 order by price
select * from jianpan where price >=100 and price <=399 order by price
select * from jianpan where price >=400 order by price
select * from jianpan where one like concat('%',#{one},'%') order by price
select * from jianpan where two like concat('%',#{two},'%') order by price
select * from jianpan where three like concat('%',#{three},'%') order by price
select * from jianpan where four like concat('%',#{four},'%') order by price
